meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas; also available via video conference

presenters: Dr. Lindsey Wilson, Director, Office of Equity and Inclusion
Jessica Galleshaw, Director, Office of Community Care and Empowerment

Christopher Graves, Human Rights Officer, Office of Equity and Inclusion

John D. Jenkins, Director, Parks and Recreation
Heather Lowe, Interim Director, Dallas Public Library
Martine Elyse Philippe, Director, Office of Arts and Culture

agenda_items.title: Approval of the September 9, 2024, Workforce, Education, and Equity Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Closing Disparities: Department Progress Measures Update - Vibrant Portfolio

agenda_items.description: Update on the Upskilling Pilot Program aimed at enhancing employee skills.

agenda_items.description: Update on the Dallas Youth Survey and collaborative efforts to engage youth.
